Faux Suede Barley Roman Blind (Swift directblinds)

Capture the perfect finish to your windows with this fantastic faux suede roman blind. Their faux suede deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. The faux suede barley roman blind is a lovely cream colour and is an excellent way to enhance your home at an affordable price. Quality is important to us and we therefore check your blind at multiple stages in its manufacture to ensure you receive the perfect blindfor your home. Dont just take their word for it, we are proud that their customers vote us excellent on trustpilot. Product id: db-rom0001 fabric colour: barley material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes Faux suede barley roman blind in cream. Made to measure from 15.58 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which complement various styles of home decoration. Its a perfect solution to creating a comfy space for you to relax in. The faux suede is soft to the touch, and is incredibly pleasing to the eye. All their blinds are made to measure right here in their west yorkshire factory. Their skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to your door. Their roman blinds come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service! Lilies, bluebells, peonies, and all things flowery make up this botanical roman blind. With dragonflies, busy bees and delicate butterflies dotting this orchid pink roman blind, with splashes of warm yellows and greens, this roman blind will look at home in your kitchen, office or bedroom. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind. Product id: db-rom1185 fabric colour: orchid pink material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. The hampshire parchment cream roman blind provides a chic and sophisticated way to complete your home decoration. Boasting a striking geometric motif, this design will complement a range of interior styles from retro to urban contemporary. The cotton rich jacquard fabric opens and folds neatly at your window using a sidewinder chain and offers comfortable shading and privacy. The sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman blind.Choose an unusual colour scheme of blue and white for your kitchen, keeping the main items of flooring, walls, tiling, and units in these two colours. Then add an accent colour, perhaps yellow, lime, or orange, to bring the room to life.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds. Blending soft, fruity orange and deep mustard yellow, the lombok in jaffa is a delectable piece that will have you yearning for citrus fruits and juices. The lightweight fabric falls into supple folds, forming a roman blind that is easy to hang, use, and manage. The jaffa could help form an unusual but effective colour scheme in the family bathroom. Keep to a white or off-white base for the walls, suite, and tiling, and use interchangeable accessories, such as towels, mats, and ornaments in yellows and oranges to match the blind. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds. Combined with the luxury of the roman shape, this sweet pattern is sure to add softness and lightness to any room. Go for a cool yet antiqued look in your master bedroom, settling the porcelain against light walls, french-style furniture, and plush fabrics. Accent with brushed metals for your fixtures and fittings, adding gold or brass for warmth, or silver to accentuate the fresh feel of the room. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds. Knightsbridge, Navy - Roman Blind (247blinds)

The knightbridge in navy offers a rich, sumptuous blue on the finely woven fabric so typical of its range. The cloth is lightweight and nimble, so it drapes neatly into its roman blind folds, and is lined with polycotton sateen fabric to protect it from colour fade. Add a classical touch to a contemporary living or dining room by blending the navy with white walls and lime green accents. This unique colour combination will provide a fantastic vivacity to the room and, accentuated with glossy silver metallics, will combine the modern with the traditional beautifully. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds. Fusing vintage tones of taupe and pink, the aquataine rose has a gorgeously romantic aesthetic, full of charm and prettiness all the way through. The blooming florals sit sweetly on this soft linen, which gathers neatly into the roman's pleats. Opt for an untraditional colour scheme in the dining room, using the pink and brown from the blind as your key colours. Choose creamy white walls, then match dark furniture to the brown and sumptuous fabrics and accessories to the pink. An unusual yet irresistible window covering!A child's bedroom or playroom would be an obvious choice for the pebble, where surrounding it with similarly fun shades will surely stir your child's imagination. But don't dismiss it as part of a fun-loving adult's room, whether a bedroom or bathroom, where a lively, multi-coloured scheme would work perfectly!Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. Lilacs, mauves, and blues are wonderfully offset by greens and yellows, forming an elaborate knot of florals that will add character to any home.Mix the wisteria with matching mauves in a bedroom or living room, opting for a light and airy look that will feel like summer all year round. Go for light colours throughout, adding fresh cottons and delicate furniture to complete the look.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds. And due to the roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice! Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects. Flexible and stepless positioning. Interchangeable fabrics. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. No visible cords ensures child safety. Installs in minutes.
